Spain: The Asturian nobility elected Nepotian of Asturias, a relative of Alfonso the Chaste, king.
Battle of the Bridge of Cornellana: Forces loyal to Bermudo's son Ramiro I of Asturias defeated Nepotian in modern Salas, Asturias.
Japan: Jōwa Incident mark the raising power of Fujiwara clan
Germany: Louis the German and Charles the Bald took the Oaths of Strasbourg, in which each pledged to aid the other against Lothair I. Their soldiers pledged not to obey an order counter to this oath.
England: Vikings raid London, Rochester, and Southampton.
